Method Detail

closeDialogue

public static boolean closeDialogue(java.lang.String id)
Close the dialogue. When a dialogue is closed it cannot be reopened.

Parameters:
id - The dialogue id
Returns:
true if dialogue could be closed or false if dialogue does not exists.

getDialogue

public static Dialogue getDialogue(java.lang.String id)
Returns a dialogue based on id

Parameters:
id - of dialogue
Returns:
return a dialogue

isDialogueClosed

public static boolean isDialogueClosed(java.lang.String id)
Gets a value indicating if dialogue is closed.

Parameters:
id - A parameter
Returns:
The return value

openDialogue

public static boolean openDialogue(java.lang.String id)
Open a dialogue based on id

Parameters:
id - A parameter
Returns:
The return value

readDialogue

public static Dialogue readDialogue(java.lang.String id)
Read a dialogue serialized in a xml file.

Parameters:
id - The id of the dialogue. The dialogue file must be placed in ./dialogues/"id".xml.
Returns:
The dialogue deserialized.

writeDialogue

public static void writeDialogue(Dialogue dialogue)
Serialize a dialogue to a xml file. The dialogue will be serialized in ./dialogues/"id".xml.

Parameters:
dialogue - The dialogue to be serialized.
